With the game going free, the game experience has been totally wrecked and no more the enjoyable game it used to be. Cheaters are insane, smurfs are too many, you can only join the game just to get bullied and belittled by people who are way better and create newer accounts just to make themselves feel better by talking down on you. Don't get it just cause its free, it only makes your blood boil. Stay away, far away.

I loved this game for years, but now i cannot recommend this game. A toxic community and failure to update this game to 128 tic servers killed it. Any matchmaking past nova (was MG2 b4 quitting) is broken with me being unable to find a fair balanced match after queueing 6 matches. I've sold my collection of skins as a final goodbye to a game that made me fall for pc gaming. I wish they would of spent more time trying to improve the game, instead of dumping out more and more cash grabs. R.I.P CSGO :(

If you don't have prime status unlocked in this game, I hope lord has mercy on you. I guarantee you that your chances of getting into a non-hacker lobby is close to the likes of zero. Even if you do have prime, every 2 or 3 games, you're still guaranteed to meet some 9 year old Russian fag with microphone settings set to max who's 1 tapping you while scoping at the floor. Rating:  -0 out of 10. But all in all, game is still worth playing if you find enjoyment in aids.
